abstractText: The purpose of benthic sampling is to obtain one or more samples of the river or reservoir bed at each site. The samples may be used describe the biological, physical, and/or chemical characteristics of the site. In the case of this method, the use of trawling is to obtain data on the abundance, biomass, and diversity of macroinvertebrate assemblages.
title: Beam trawl benthic invertebrates v1.0
